00026 // <Canvas Opacity="0.5" RenderTransform="0.75,0,0,0.75,25,46">
00027 // <!-- contents -->
00028 // </Canvas>
00029 
00030 class XamlCanvas : public XamlDrawable

00032                  , public XamlDrawableAttributes::Name::Provider
